title: 5.0: can't delete files, after reload white site, high cpu load without activity
body:
## expected behaviour
working owncloud :)

### actual behaviour
in chrome: white site and it's loading forever... until webserver restart

in ff it works normallyat the same time, but after some clicking around there the same error appears...

on this instance it take 4 seconds to save changes to a text file in the webinterface, deleting files don't work or after some minutes or hours... 

after i logged out on both browsers, the cpu usage is still very high...

![2013-03-25 15_39_16-davidak owncloud-performance-test_ ](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/298331/12cbbc0a-955a-11e2-8a2c-e2661b5d0620.png)

same problem like here: https://github.com/owncloud/core/issues/2510

### steps to reproduce
1. install 5.0 with mysql with setup-owncloud.php
2. create some folders, upload some files, click images app
3. site is loading but nothing happens for ca. 5h now ...

### server configuration

virtual maschine in virtualbox on windows 7 with 2048mb ram and 4 cores of a i7.

operating system: ubuntu-server 12.10

web server: apache2

database: mysql

php version: 5.3.10-1ubuntu3.6 

owncloud version: 5.0

### client configuration
browser: chrome 25...

operating system: windows 7

### logs
#### web server error log
```nothing related```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
...
oud\/lib\/public\/share.php#918","level":2,"time":1363829082}
```

i randomly found this in mysql process status:
```
update `oc_preferences` set `configvalue` = '514a588151d63' where `userid` = 'davidak' and `appid` = |
update `oc_preferences` set `configvalue` = '514a5a31225cd' where `userid` = 'davidak' and `appid` = |
select `configvalue` from `oc_preferences` where `userid` = 'davidak' and `appid` = 'files_sharing'  |
update `oc_preferences` set `configvalue` = '514a5a743a42b' where `userid` = 'davidak' and `appid` = |
```

something is happening, but the webinterface won't come back until webserver restart...
